column4: I installed ardour/jack on ubuntu 10.04b2, now jack has taken over/stops pulseaudio from starting, any advice on what to do ?
you can't have them both, because each of them needs to have exclusive access to the hardware
I guess so, I don't want jackd to load at boot, I have no idea on how to stop it from doing so though
hmm, can't help you there sorry
